name: zx-basic-vscode-extension
description: VS Code extension for ZX Spectrum BASIC development with Interface 1 transfer

zxBasic.model.description: Target ZX Spectrum model for language features and validation

zxBasic.strictMode.description: Warn about non-standard BASIC syntax and features not available in target model

zxBasic.maxLineLength.description: Warn when a line exceeds this length (ZX Spectrum supports up to 255 chars)

zxBasic.uppercaseKeywords.description: Auto-uppercase keywords on completion and formatting

zx-basic.serialPort.description: The serial port for RS232 transfer

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd .. && npm run build && cd vscode-extension && npm run compile && mkdir -p out/server out/converter out/rs232-transfer out/syntax-definitions && cp ../lsp-server/out/server.js out/server/ && cp ../converter/out/index.js out/converter/ && cp ../rs232-transfer/out/index.js out/rs232-transfer/ && (cp ../syntax-definitions/keywords.js out/syntax-definitions/ || cp ../syntax-definitions/keywords.ts out/syntax-definitions/) && sed -i 's#require("syntax-definitions/keywords")#require("../syntax-definitions/keywords")#g' out/converter/index.js
scripts.dev: npm run compile && mkdir -p out/server out/converter out/rs232-transfer out/syntax-definitions && cp ../lsp-server/out/server.js out/server/ && cp ../converter/out/index.js out/converter/ && cp ../rs232-transfer/out/index.js out/rs232-transfer/ && (cp ../syntax-definitions/keywords.js out/syntax-definitions/ || cp ../syntax-definitions/keywords.ts out/syntax-definitions/) && sed -i 's#require("syntax-definitions/keywords")#require("../syntax-definitions/keywords")#g' out/converter/index.js
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
